Package it.polimi.ingsw.models.components.characters.effects

Class Effects

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.models.components.characters.effects.Effects
public class Effects extends Object
This is collection of effects. Notes: - to reduce coupling GameOperations.updateProfessorOwners() must be called only from the effects that DON'T add or remove students from the player halls.

  • Field Details

    • BLOCK_ISLAND

      public static final Effect BLOCK_ISLAND
      Takes a block from the character and blocks the selected island. An island can be blocked multiple times. required args: gameState, island to block, the character where islands blocks are picked.

    • CALCULATE_INFLUENCE_ON_ISLAND

      public static final Effect CALCULATE_INFLUENCE_ON_ISLAND
      Calculates the influence on the selected island. required args: gameState, island where the influence is calculated.

    • IGNORE_STUDENT_COLOR

      public static final Effect IGNORE_STUDENT_COLOR
      Ignore the specified student color during influence calculation. required args: gameState, student to ignore.

    • IGNORE_TOWERS

      public static final Effect IGNORE_TOWERS
      Ignore tower during in the influence calculation. required args: gameState

    • ONE_STUDENT_TO_HALL

      public static final Effect ONE_STUDENT_TO_HALL
      Moves one student from the character to the current player hall. It then draws a student from the bag and puts it on the character. required args: gameState, student to move, the character played that has this effect.

    • ONE_STUDENT_TO_ISLAND

      public static final Effect ONE_STUDENT_TO_ISLAND
      Moves one student from the character to the specified island. It then draws a student from the bag and puts it on the character. required args: gameState, the student to move, the island where the student is moved.

    • GET_PROF_ON_STUDENT_TIE

      public static final Effect GET_PROF_ON_STUDENT_TIE
      Give the professor to the current player even if there is tie. required args: gameState.

    • REMOVE_STUDENTS

      public static final Effect REMOVE_STUDENTS
      Puts back into the bag 3 students of the selected color from all player halls. If there are not 3 students, it removes all the students it can. required args: gameState, student to remove.

    • EXCHANGE_STUDENTS_BETWEEN_CHARACTER_AND_ENTRANCE

      public static final Effect EXCHANGE_STUDENTS_BETWEEN_CHARACTER_AND_ENTRANCE
      Exchanges max 3 students between the character and the entrance. required args: gameState, lists of students to exchange between the character and the entrance.

    • EXCHANGE_STUDENTS_BETWEEN_HALL_AND_ENTRANCE

      public static final Effect EXCHANGE_STUDENTS_BETWEEN_HALL_AND_ENTRANCE
      Exchanges max 2 students between the hall and the entrance. required args: gameState, lists of students to exchange between the hall and the entrance.

    • ADD_TWO_INFLUENCE_POINTS

      public static final Effect ADD_TWO_INFLUENCE_POINTS
      Gives to the current player two additional influence points. required args: gameState.

    • ADD_TWO_MOTHER_NATURE_STEPS

      public static final Effect ADD_TWO_MOTHER_NATURE_STEPS
      Gives to mother nature two additional steps.

    • Effects

      private Effects()

  • Method Details

    • exchangeStudents

      private static void exchangeStudents(Character character, List<Student> characterStudents, Entrance entrance, List<Student> entranceStudents)

    • exchangeStudents

      private static void exchangeStudents(Hall hall, List<Student> hallStudents, Entrance entrance, List<Student> entranceStudents)

    • removeStudentsFromCharacter

      private static void removeStudentsFromCharacter(List<Student> students, Character character)
      Character is left unchanged if remove fails.
      Parameters:
      students - the students to remove from the character.
      character - the character where the students are removed.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if all students cannot be removed.

    • removeStudentsFromEntrance

      private static void removeStudentsFromEntrance(List<Student> students, Entrance entrance)
      Entrance is left unchanged if remove fails.
      Parameters:
      students - the students to remove from the entrance.
      entrance - the entrance where the students are removed.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if all students cannot be removed.

    • removeStudentsFromHall

      private static void removeStudentsFromHall(List<Student> students, Hall hall)
      Hall is left unchanged if remove fails.
      Parameters:
      students - the students to remove from the hall.
      hall - the hall where the students are removed.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if all students cannot be removed.

    • refillCharacter

      private static void refillCharacter(GameState state, Character character)
      Draws a student from the bag and places it on the character. If the bag is empty no student is added to the character.
      Parameters:
      state - the state of the game.
      character - the character to refill.
